thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Very helpful staff member when I first called assured there would be no problems returning if not the right item.
Item received exactly the cartridge I needed and worked with no problem. Hoping this one will last a while having read other reviews.
Will be shopping with shower doctor again.
